name: Non Player Crafter
description:
Being an Orc Blacksmith in an Open World RPG can be tough... go through a series of harsh customers to fix their runes, weapons, and shields. Be careful of the psychotic one they call "Player".

This game was developed for the Global Game Jam 2020 with a team for 7 people! The theme was repair, so we did a fixing game based off of Warioware style mini games. Enjoy!

Credits:

  • Drew Bushnell - Developer
  • Zach Berglund - Developer/Audio
  • Alex Larumbe - Sound Designer
  • Katrina Kim - Artist
  • Tina Lu - Artist (gnome designer)
  • Helene Choyer - Composer
  • Harrison Cote - Developer (Gnome Enthusiast)
